p: Crystal structure of the SARS-CoV-2 3CL pro was retrieved from PDB (PDB ID: 6Y2G). The protein macromolecule (SARS-CoV-2 3CL pro) optimization was carried out in UCSF Chimera software [ 31, 37, 38] by adding polar hydrogen atoms, removing water molecules, implying amber parameters, followed by minimization with the MMTK method in 500 steps with a step size of 0.02 Ã…. SARS-CoV-2 3CL pro contained chain A and B of 306 amino acids sequence length. Chain A of PDB ID: 6Y2G containing alpha-ketoamide (O6K) inhibitor was used for identification of substrate binding site.
